Q_DESC: In a rope consecutive numbers are tied by rakshash. A man see that rope and try to play a swing. While touching the rope rakshash warn the man to answer the query correctly and then swing in it. The query is that, a man need to find the sum of numbers and print the reverse value of the sum value. If the sums unit position is zero he needs to discard while reversing andthen tells answer. In a rope first number is total count of the number present in the rope except the count number. The output will be the element with its position (starts zero) followed by sum value and reverse value.
